title: Dark Warriors' Fortress

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Dark Warriors' Fortress is a castle in level 14 to 16 multi-combat Wilderness, north of Falador. It is populated with level 8 and 145 dark warriors. Caution should be used as these warriors can overwhelm lower level players who don't use Protect from Melee.

Not to be confused with Black Knights' Fortress.
The wiki defaults to the British convention for floor numbering: Ground floor, first floor, etc. This may be changed by clicking the moon icon at the top right of the site.
Dark Warriors' Fortress

Black Knights' Fortress

The Dark Warriors' Fortress is a castle in level 14 to 16 multi-combat Wilderness, north of Falador. It is populated with level 8 and 145 dark warriors. Caution should be used as these warriors can overwhelm lower level players who don't use Protect from Melee.

Contents

  • 1 Ground floor
    • 1.1 Tips
  • 2 First floor
  • 3 Second floor
  • 4 Third floor
  • 5 Changes
  • 6 Trivia

Ground floor[edit | edit source]

This floor has several rooms, and is crowded with dark warriors. The northernmost room contains respawns of 5 Earth, Water, Air and Fire runes. The room directly west of this contains 5 Chaos, Mind and Body runes. Players should be wary when approaching this area: Although this a good place for a rune spawn, player killers may attack and very possibly kill other players who are around their combat level. In the centre of this floor is a courtyard containing, amongst other things, a crate which players are sometimes led to when completing hard Treasure Trails.

Tips[edit | edit source]

You can safe spot them by luring them to the central yard and hugging the west wall. They will stall at the centre of the yard and not attack you.

You can achieve tolerance with the dark warriors after 10 minutes whether you fight with them or not.

In the room with the 5 Chaos, Mind and Body runes, if you position yourself correctly using the broken ladder, you can be safe from the dark warrior inside the room.

First floor[edit | edit source]

This floor is the top level of the castle walls. It contains nothing of interest beyond more dark warriors. Players looking to collect rune spawns on the ground floor can climb up the ladder in the south-western room and climb down the broken ladder in the north-western room in order to save a little bit of time coming in, since there's a wall blocking access to the Chaos runes from the entrance that would otherwise require walking all the way around the castle. The broken ladder does not allow access from the chaos rune spawn room to the upper floor. It is only a one way ladder and may only be climbed from above.

Second floor[edit | edit source]

This floor is the inside of the towers. There is nothing of interest in any of the towers. This floor contains only level 8 dark warriors, making this a viable option for lower levelled accounts doing wilderness Slayer.

Third floor[edit | edit source]

A spectacular, if grim, view from the spires of the castle. Nothing of interest is found up here.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
13 March 2014
(update | poll)

High level dark warriors have been added to the Dark Warriors' Fortress.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The Chaos rune spawn is considerably slower than the other runes' spawns.
  • Even though this is the Dark Warriors' Fortress, there appear to be Saradomin shields mounted on the walls. However, there are swords piercing the shields, meaning that they are likely a statement against Saradomin.
  • On the second floor, there is a banner similar to the one in the Wizards' Tower.

The '''Dark Warriors' Fortress''' is a castle in level 14 to 16 [[Multi-combat area|multi-combat]] [[Wilderness]], north of [[Falador]]. It is populated with level 8 and 145 [[dark warrior]]s. Caution should be used as these warriors can overwhelm lower level players who don't use [[Protect from Melee]].

==Ground floor==
This floor has several rooms, and is crowded with dark warriors. The northernmost room contains respawns of 5 [[Earth rune|Earth]], [[Water rune|Water]], [[Air rune|Air]] and [[Fire rune|Fire]] runes. The room directly west of this contains 5 [[Chaos rune|Chaos]], [[Mind rune|Mind]] and [[Body rune|Body]] runes. Players should be wary when approaching this area: Although this a good place for a rune spawn, player killers may attack and very possibly kill other players who are around their combat level. In the centre of this floor is a courtyard containing, amongst other things, a crate which players are sometimes led to when completing hard [[Treasure Trail]]s.

===Tips===
You can safe spot them by luring them to the central yard and hugging the west wall. They will stall at the centre of the yard and not attack you.

You can achieve [[tolerance]] with the dark warriors after 10 minutes whether you fight with them or not.

In the room with the 5 Chaos, Mind and Body runes, if you position yourself correctly using the broken ladder, you can be safe from the dark warrior inside the room.

==First floor==
This floor is the top level of the castle walls. It contains nothing of interest beyond more [[dark warrior]]s. Players looking to collect rune spawns on the ground floor can climb up the ladder in the south-western room and climb down the broken ladder in the north-western room in order to save a little bit of time coming in, since there's a wall blocking access to the [[Chaos rune]]s from the entrance that would otherwise require walking all the way around the castle. The broken ladder does not allow access from the chaos rune spawn room to the upper floor. It is only a one way ladder and may only be climbed from above.

==Second floor==
This floor is the inside of the towers. There is nothing of interest in any of the towers. This floor contains only level 8 dark warriors, making this a viable option for lower levelled accounts doing wilderness Slayer.

==Third floor==
A spectacular, if grim, view from the spires of the castle. Nothing of interest is found up here.

==Changes==
{{Subject changes header}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 13 March 2014
|update = Rejuvenating the Wilderness: More risk, more reward
|poll = Old School feature poll 15: Rejuvenating the Wilderness
|change = High level dark warriors have been added to the Dark Warriors' Fortress.
}}
{{Subject changes footer}}

==Trivia==
*The Chaos rune spawn is considerably slower than the other runes' spawns.
*Even though this is the Dark Warriors' Fortress, there appear to be [[Saradomin]] shields mounted on the walls. However, there are swords piercing the shields, meaning that they are likely a statement against Saradomin.
*On the second floor, there is a banner similar to the one in the [[Wizards' Tower]].
